Spanish: La Alta Edad Media fue precedida por la Temprana Edad Media y le siguió la Edad Media Tardía que, por convención, finaliza cerca del 1500.
English:
output: The High Middle Ages were preceded by the Early Middle Ages and followed by the Late Middle Ages, which by convention ends around 1500.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El determinismo tecnológico es un concepto que comprende, pragmáticamente, un gran abanico de ideas, desde el impulso o imperativo tecnológico hasta un sentido estricto de que existe una lógica subyacente que impulsa el destino de la humanidad y que se relaciona con las leyes de la ciencia y cómo se ven plasmadas en la tecnología.
English:
output: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Casi todas las interpretaciones del determinismo tecnológico tienen en común dos ideas generales: que el desarrollo tecnológico en sí mismo se despliega por un camino independiente de cualquier influencia cultural o política y que, al mismo tiempo, la tecnología tiene «efectos» en las sociedades que son inherentes y no socialmente condicionados.
English:
output: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Para dar un ejemplo, uno podría sostener que la existencia de los automóviles necesariamente deriva en el desarrollo de carreteras.
English:
output: For example, one might say that the motor car necessarily leads to the development of roads.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Sin embargo, una red nacional de carreteras no es viable económicamente para un volumen reducido de automóviles, con lo cual se están diseñando nuevas técnicas de fabricación para reducir los costes de ser propietario de un vehículo.
English:
output: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El uso masivo de automóviles también genera una mayor incidencia en los accidentes de tránsito, lo que conduce al desarrollo de nuevas técnicas en el campo de la salud para reparar los cuerpos dañados.
English:
output: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El elemento del determinismo cultural se encontraba muy presente en el romanticismo, según estudiosos como Goether, Fichte y Schlegel.
English:
output: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En el contexto del Romanticismo, la geografía moldeó a las personas y, con el transcurso del tiempo, se desarrollaron costumbres y culturas relacionadas con esa geografía que, al estar en armonía con la localización de esa sociedad, eran preferibles a leyes que se impusieran de forma arbitraria.
English:
output: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Así como París se conoce como la ciudad de la moda en la actualidad, Constantinopla era considerada como tal en la Europa feudal.
English:
output: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Su fama de ser epicentro del lujo comenzó aproximadamente en 400 a. C y se extendió hasta aproximadamente 1100 d. C.
English:
output: Its renown for being an epicenter of luxury began in about 400 A.D. and lasted up until about 1100 A.D.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Durante el siglo XII su estatus decayó, sobre todo debido a que, a su regreso, los cruzados trajeron obsequios, como sedas y especias, a los que se les daba mayor valor que a los bienes ofrecidos en los mercados bizantinos.
English:
output: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El título de «capital de la moda» fue traspasado, a partir de entonces, de Constantinopla a París.
English:
output: It was at this time that the transfer of the title of Fashion Capital from Constantinople to Paris was made.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La cúspide del estilo gótico tuvo lugar en el período entre los siglos X-XI y el XIV.
English:
output: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En un comienzo, la forma de vestir recibió gran influencia de la cultura bizantina en el este.
English:
output: At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: No obstante, debido a la lentitud de los canales de comunicación, los estilos occidentales podrían llevar un retraso de unos 25 a 30 años.
English:
output: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Hacia fines de la Edad Media, Europa occidental empezó a desarrollar un estilo propio. Uno de los avances más significativos de esa época fue que, producto de las Cruzadas, las personas comenzaron a usar botones para abrochar sus prendas.
English:
output: towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Se entiende por agricultura de subsistencia aquella cuyo objetivo es producir suficientes alimentos para atender exclusivamente las necesidades del agricultor y su grupo familiar.
English:
output: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La agricultura de subsistencia es una práctica sencilla, generalmente orgánica, que combina el uso de semillas almacenadas originarias de la región ecológica con la rotación de cultivos u otros métodos comparativamente simples para maximizar la producción.
English:
output: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Históricamente, gran parte de ac principal actividad de los granjeros era la agricultura de subsistencia, la que se sigue practicando en muchos países en vías de desarrollo.
English:
output: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Las subculturas congregan individuos con ideas semejantes y sentimientos de marginación por los estándares sociales y les brinda la posibilidad de generar un sentido de identidad.
English:
output: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Son muchos los factores que pueden distinguir a las subculturas: edad, etnia, clase, ubicación o género de sus integrantes.
English:
output: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los rasgos que distinguen a una subcultura pueden ser lingüísticos, estéticos, sexuales, geográficos o estar relacionados con la religión o la política, o una mezcla de factores.
English:
output: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Es frecuente que los integrantes de una subcultura exhiban rasgos de su pertenencia a esta recurriendo al uso distintivo y simbólico del estilo, como las modas, los gestos y le jerga.
English:
output: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Uno de los mecanismos más comúnmente usados para graficar la importancia de sociabilizar es analizar los pocos y lamentables casos de niños que, por negligencia, desgracia o abuso intencional, no fueron socializados por adultos durante su crecimiento.
English:
output: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: A estos niños se los apoda «salvajes». Algunos niños salvajes son confinados por personas, en general sus padres. En algunos casos, el abandono de un niño se debe al rechazo de los padres a la discapacidad intelectual o física grave que tenga el niño.
English:
output: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Es posible que los niños salvajes hayan sufrido situaciones traumáticas o abuso infantil grave antes de ser abandonados o de que huyeran.
English:
output: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Se dice que otros fueron criados por animales y que algunos han vivido por su cuenta en el mundo silvestre.
English:
output: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Cuando el niño salvaje es criado exclusivamente por animales distintos de los humanos, presenta comportamientos (dentro de sus posibilidades físicas) casi en un todo iguales a las del animal específico que lo cuidó, así como su miedo o indiferencia hacia las personas.
English:
output: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Aun cuando el aprendizaje basado en proyectos debería facilitar ese proceso y hacerlo más interesante, el andamiaje va un poco más allá.
English:
output: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El andamiaje no es una técnica de aprendizaje; es, antes bien, una asistencia que proporciona apoyo a quienes atraviesan una nueva experiencia, como el uso de un nuevo programa informático o el inicio de un nuevo proyecto.
English:
output: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El andamiaje puede presentarse tanto en formato real como virtual; para decirlo de otro modo, un docente es un tipo de andamio, pero también lo es el pequeño sujetapapeles animado de Microsoft Office.
English:
output: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los andamiajes virtuales se encuentran incorporados al software y su función es cuestionar, estimular o explicar procedimientos que pueden haber resultado complejos para el estudiante por sí solo.
English:
output: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Se acoge a los niños en hogares de guarda por una amplia variedad de motivos, desde negligencia hasta abuso e, incluso, extorsión.
English:
output: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Ningún niño debería tener que crecer, jamás, en un entorno en el que no haya cariño, cuidados y educación; pero sucede.
English:
output: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Podemos percibir que el sistema de acogida familiar proporciona un ámbito seguro para estos niños.
English:
output: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El objetivo de nuestro sistema de crianza de acogida es ofrecer hogares seguros, tutores amorosos, educación sostenida y asistencia médica confiable.
English:
output: Our foster care system is supposed to provide safe homes, loving caregivers, stable education, and reliable health care.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El objetivo del acogimiento familiar es cubrir todas las necesidades que no eran atendidas en el hogar del que fueron recogidos con anterioridad.
English:
output: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Internet une y mezcla componentes propios de la comunicación masiva y entre personas.
English:
output: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los distintos rasgos que presenta la Internet abren paso a nuevas dimensiones desde la perspectiva del concepto de usos y recompensas.
English:
output: The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Por ejemplo, se señalan el «aprendizaje» y la «socialización» como incentivos significativos para el uso de Internet (James et al., 1995).
English:
output: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Durante un estudio de las reacciones de los usuarios a los sitios web conducido por Eighmey y McCord (1998), se detectaron también la «participación personal» y las «relaciones duraderas» como nuevos factores motivacionales.
English:
output: “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: A través de la grabación de videos, se han producido importantes hallazgos en la interpretación de micorexpresiones, que son movimientos en el rostro de tan solo unos milisegundos de duración.
English:
output: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Concretamente, se sostiene que, mediante la adecuada lectura de sus microexpresiones, es posible detectar si una persona está mintiendo.
English:
output: In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Oliver Sacks, en su artículo El discurso del presidente, explicó la forma en que aquellos que no pueden comprender el habla a causa de un daño cerebral, pueden, no obstante, evaluar la sinceridad con precisión.
English:
output: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Incluso sugiere que las habilidades para interpretar la conducta humana se pueden compartir con animales, como los perros domésticos.
English:
output: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: A través de los trabajos de investigación del siglo XX se ha demostrado que existen dos grupos de variación genética: la oculta y la manifiesta.
English:
output: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El proceso de mutación incorpora una nueva variación genética; el de selección la remueve de ese conjunto de variaciones.
English:
output: Mutation adds new genetic variation, and selection removes it from the pool of expressed variation.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La segregación y la recombinación barajan la variación entre uno y otro generación tras generación.
English:
output: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En la sabana, no resulta fácil para un primate, cuyo sistema digestivo es igual al humano, satisfacer sus necesidades de aminoácidos con los recursos vegetales de los que dispone.
English:
output: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Es más, no hacerlo acarrea serios problemas: desaceleración del crecimiento, desnutrición y, en último término, la muerte.
English:
output: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Las proteínas presentes en las hojas y las legumbres hubiesen constituido la fuente de recursos vegetales de más sencillo acceso, pero no son fácilmente digeribles para primates como nosotros, excepto que se las cocine.
English:
output: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En cambio, los alimentos derivados de animales (hormigas, termitas, huevos) resultan fáciles de digerir al tiempo que aportan un gran número de proteínas que contienen la totalidad de los aminoácidos esenciales.
English:
output: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En definitiva, no debería causarnos sorpresa si nuestros propios predecesores resolvían sus «problemas proteicos» del mismo modo que los chimpancés de la sabana en la actualidad.
English:
output: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La interrupción del sueño consiste en despertarse intencionalmente durante el período normal de sueño y dormirse después de un rato (10 a 60 minutos).
English:
output: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Esto puede lograrse fácilmente con un reloj de alarma más o menos suave que lo haga volver a un estado consciente, aunque sin despertarlo por completo.
English:
output: This can be easily done by using a relatively quiet alarm clock to bring you to consciousness without fully waking you.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El registro es una exigencia adicional para el proceso del visado. En algunos países, tendrá que registrar su presencia y la dirección de su alojamiento con las autoridades locales.
English:
output: If you find yourself resetting the clock in your sleep, it can be placed on the other side of the room, forcing you to get out of bed to turn it off.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Otras opciones que se basan en el ritmo biológico consisten en beber mucho líquido (en especial agua o té, conocido diurético) antes de acostarse, lo que lo obligará a levantarse para orinar.
English:
output: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El nivel de paz interior del que goza una persona se relaciona de manera opuesta con la cantidad de tensión que haya en su cuerpo y en su espíritu.
English:
output: The amount of inner peace a person possesses correlates oppositely to the amount of tension in one’s body and spirit.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Cuanto más baja sea la tensión, más positiva es la fuerza de la vida con la que contemos. Cada uno de nosotros tiene el potencial de hallar paz y dicha absolutas.
English:
output: The lower the tension, the more positive the life force present. Every person has the potential to find absolute peace and contentment.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Todos podemos alcanzar la iluminación. Lo único que obstaculiza el camino es nuestra tensión y negatividad.
English:
output: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Si bien las bases del budismo tibetano son las enseñanzas de Buda, se extendieron por el sendero del amor Mahayana y numerosas técnicas del yoga de la India.
English:
output: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En términos generales, el laísmo es muy sencillo. Se basa en el kundalini yoga, la meditación y el camino del amor que todo lo abarca.
English:
output: In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En Kundalini Yoga, la energía Kundalini (iluminación) se activa con posiciones de yoga, prácticas de respiración, mantras o visualizaciones.
English:
output: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La meditación tibetana se centra en el Devata Yoga. A través de la visualización de distintas deidades, pueden desobstaculizarse los canales de energía, activarse los chakras y desarrollar la conciencia de la iluminación.
English:
output: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La cooperación entre la URSS y EUA fue el resultado de enfrentarse a un enemigo común, Alemania, durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Terminada la guerra, los choques de sistema, proceso y cultura terminaron por distanciar a los dos países.
English:
output: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: A dos años del final de la guerra, los que eran aliados ahora eran enemigos y la Guerra Fría comenzó.
English:
output: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Se extendería por los siguientes 40 años y sería combatida de verdad, a través de milicias substitutas, en campos de batalla desde África hasta Asia, en Afganistán, Cuba, entre muchos otros sitios.
English:
output: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Debido a que para el 17 de septiembre de 1939 la defensa polaca ya estaba quebrada, su única esperanza era dar la retirada y reorganizarse en la extensión de la cabeza de puente rumana.
English:
output: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: No obstante, estos planes cayeron en desuso casi de un día para otro, cuando más de 800 000 combatientes del Ejército Rojo de la Unión Soviética ingresaron y formaron los frentes bielorruso y ucraniano luego de invadir las regiones del este de Polonia, infringiendo el Tratado de Paz de Riga, el pacto de No Agresión soviético-polaca y otros acuerdos internacionales, bilaterales y multilaterales.
English:
output: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Utilizar buques para transportar bienes es un modo mucho más eficaz para trasladar grandes números de personas y bienes por los océanos.
English:
output: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Desde siempre, la función de la marina ha sido garantizar que su país conserve la facultad de trasladar a su población y mercancías, a la vez que, interfiere con la capacidad del enemigo para hacer lo propio.
English:
output: The job of navies has traditionally been to ensure that your country maintains the ability to move your people and goods, while at the same time, interfering with your enemy's ability to move his people and goods.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La campaña del Atlántico Norte en la Segunda Guerra Mundial ofrece uno de los ejemplos más claros y recientes de ello. Los estadounidenses intentaban trasladar hombres y materiales por el Océano Atlántico con el fin de apoyar a Gran Bretaña.
English:
output: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: A la vez, la armada alemana, empleando principalmente sumergibles, intentaba anular esta circulación.
English:
output: At the same time, the German navy, using mainly U-boats, was trying to stop this traffic.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Si los Aliados no hubiesen tenido éxito, Alemania podría haber tomado el poder en Gran Bretaña, al igual que lo hizo con los demás países europeos.
English:
output: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Al parecer, las cabras fueron domesticadas, por primera vez, hace unos 10 000 años, en los montes Zagros, en Irán.
English:
output: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Con el propósito de obtener fácilmente su leche, pelo, carne y cuero, los pueblos y tribus antiguos empezaron a quedarse con ellos.
English:
output: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Por lo general, las cabras domésticas eran reunidas en rebaños que vagaban por las colinas u otras zonas de pastoreo, con frecuencia cuidadas por pastores de cabras que solían ser niños o adolescentes, semejante al pastor más popular. Estos métodos de pastoreo aún se utilizan en la actualidad.
English:
output: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En Inglaterra, las vías de tren ya se habían instalado hacia el siglo XVI.
English:
output: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Aun cuando los rieles de los carros estaban hechos de simples tablas paralelas de madera, permitían que los caballos que jalaban de ellos lograran una mayor velocidad y arrastraran cargas más pesadas que en los caminos un poco más escabrosos del día.
English:
output: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La incorporación de durmientes para mantener a los rieles en su lugar se produjo bastante temprano. No obstante, paulatinamente, fueron dándose cuenta de que los rieles resultarían más eficientes si estuvieran revestidos de hierro en su parte superior.
English:
output: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Ello se volvió en una práctica habitual, aunque el hierro provocó un mayor desgaste en las ruedas de los vagones, hechas de madera.
English:
output: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Eventualmente, se reemplazaron las ruedas de madera con otras hechas de hierro y, en 1767, comenzaron a utilizarse rieles de hierro macizo.
English:
output: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La primera forma de transporte que se conoció fue el caminar. El ser humano comenzó a hacerlo en posición erguida dos millones de años atrás con la aparición del Homo Erectus (que quiere decir hombre erguido).
English:
output: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man).

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Sus predecesores, los Australopithecus, no tenían el hábito de caminar erectos.
English:
output: Their predecessors, the Australopithecus did not walk upright as habitually.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Si bien se han encontrado rastros de bipedestación en fósiles de Australopitecos de hace 4,2 a 3,9 millones de años, es posible que el Sahelanthropus haya caminado sobre dos patas hace 7 millones de años.
English:
output: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Podemos comenzar a llevar una vida más amigable con el planeta, formar parte de movimientos ambientalistas o, incluso, podemos volvernos activistas y luchar para aminorar, en alguna medida, el sufrimiento futuro.
English:
output: We can start living more friendly to the environment, we can join to the environmental movement, and we can even be activists in order to reduce the future suffering in some degree.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Es, en muchos casos, como el tratamiento asintomático. Pero si no se busca solamente una situación temporal, deberíamos encontrar la raíz de los problemas e intentar desactivarlos.
English:
output: This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Resulta manifiesto que el mundo ha sufrido grandes cambios, producto de los avances tecnológicos y científicos de la humanidad, y los problemas se han intensificado por causa de la superpoblación y el estilo de vida extravagante de las personas.
English:
output: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Luego de ser aprobada por el Congreso el 4 de julio, se envió un borrador escrito a mano y firmado por el presidente del Congreso, John Hancock, y el secretario, Charles Thomson, a la imprenta de John Dunlap, a unas pocas calles de distancia.
English:
output: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Se realizaron, durante la noche, entre 150 y 200 copias, a las que actualmente se conoce como las «Copias Dunlap».
English:
output: Through the night between 150 and 200 copies were made, now known as "Dunlap broadsides".

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Fue John Nixon quien leyó por primera vez el documento y lo hizo en el patio del Salón de la Independencia, el 8 de julio.
English:
output: The first public reading of the document was by John Nixon in the yard of Independence Hall on July 8.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El 6 de julio se envió una copia a George Washington, quien ordenó que se la leyeran a su ejército en Nueva York el 9 de julio. El 10 de agosto llegó otra copia a Londres.
English:
output: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Las 25 fotografías de Dunlap, que se sabe que aún existen, son las copias más antiguas conservadas del documento. El manuscrito original se ha perdido.
English:
output: The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Una gran cantidad de paleontólogos cree que un grupo de dinosaurios sobrevivió y sigue vivo hoy en día. Son los pájaros.
English:
output: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Muchas personas no se los representan como dinosaurios, ya que tienen plumas y pueden volar.
English:
output: Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Sin embargo, hay muchas características en las aves que todavía las asemejan a los dinosaurios.
English:
output: But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Tienen extremidades escamadas y con garras, ponen huevos y se desplazan sobre sus patas traseras al igual que el T-Rex.
English:
output: They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Actualmente, casi todas las computadoras funcionan en base a la manipulación de datos codificados bajo el sistema binario.
English:
output: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Un número binario únicamente puede tener uno de dos valores, ellos son el 0 y el 1 y, de acuerdo con la jerga informática, estos números se conocen como dígitos binarios, o bits.
English:
output: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El envenenamiento interno puede no evidenciarse de inmediato. Sus síntomas, como, por ejemplo, el vómito, son demasiado habituales como para poder dar un diagnóstico inmediato.
English:
output: Internal poisoning may not be immediately apparent. Symptoms, such as vomiting are sufficiently general that an immediate diagnosis cannot be made.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El más claro indicador de envenenamiento interno puede ser encontrar con un frasco abierto de medicinas o de productos de limpieza químicos tóxicos.
English:
output: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Lea la etiqueta para contar con información específica sobre los primeros auxilios pertinentes para ese veneno específico.
English:
output: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los entomólogos emplean el término insecto parásito en un sentido formal para referirse a este grupo de artrópodos.
English:
output: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La palabra proviene de su antigua relación con las chinches, especie muy desarrollada para parasitar a los humanos.
English:
output: This term derives from ancient familiarity with Bed-bugs, which are insects highly adapted to parasitize humans.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Las chinches asesinas y las de cama son nidícolas; están adaptadas para habitar el nido u hogar de su anfitrión.
English:
output: Both Assassin-bugs and Bed-bugs are nidicolous, adapted to living in nest or housing of their host.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los casos registrados de esclerosis múltiple (EM) en EE. UU. ascienden a cerca de 400 000, lo que la hace la enfermedad neurológica más frecuente entre adultos jóvenes y de mediana edad.
English:
output: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El sistema nervioso central, unión del cerebro, la médula espinal y el nervio óptico, es el objeto de ataque de la esclerosis múltiple.
English:
output: MS is a disease that affects the central nervous system, which is made up of the brain, the spinal cord and the optic nerve.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los estudios indicaron que las mujeres tienen el doble de probabilidades que los hombres de padecer EM.
English:
output: Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Una pareja podría concluir que criar a un bebé no sería lo más conveniente para ellos o para el niño.
English:
output: A couple may decide it is not in their best interest, or in the interest of their child, to raise a baby.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Estas parejas podrían elegir planificar la adopción de un bebé.
English:
output: These couples may choose to make an adoption plan for their baby.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En una adopción, los padres biológicos renuncian a sus derechos parentales para que una pareja distinta pueda hacerse cargo del niño.
English:
output: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El objetivo capital de la ciencia es descifrar el modo en que funciona el mundo a través del método científico. En efecto, este método sirve de guía para la mayor parte de las investigaciones científicas.
English:
output: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: No se trata, sin embargo, de una experimentación, es una prueba que se usa para descartar una o más de las posibles hipótesis, haciendo preguntas y observaciones que guían la investigación científica.
English:
output: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El foco tanto de naturalistas como de filósofos fue puesto en las obras clásicas; especialmente, en la versión en latín del texto bíblico.
English:
output: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los pensamientos de Aristóteles, en especial las cuestiones de la ciencia, incluso la psicología, fueron aceptadas.
English:
output: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: A medida que el dominio del idioma griego fue decayendo, Occidente se distanció de sus raíces griegas tanto filosóficas como científicas.
English:
output: As knowledge of Greek declined, the West found itself cut off from its Greek philosophical and scientific roots.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Con frecuencia, muchos ritmos presentes en procesos fisiológicos y en el comportamiento dependen de manera decisiva de ciclos internos y su producción a través de relojes biológicos.
English:
output: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los ritmos periódicos, que no solo se tratan de reacciones a estímulos externos regulares, se han registrado en casi todos los seres vivos, incluso en bacterias, hongos, plantas y animales.
English:
output: Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los relojes biológicos oscilan de forma autosostenida y tienen un período de funcionamiento cíclico libre, aun si no hay estímulos externos.
English:
output: Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Uno de los indicadores clave de que el ADN consistía en un material de tipo genético fue el experimento conducido por Hershey y Chase.
English:
output: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Hershey y Chase insertaron su propio ADN en una bacteria usando fagos, o virus.
English:
output: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Realizaron dos experimentos en los que marcaron el ADN del fago con fósforo radioactivo o la proteína del ADN con azufre radioactivo.
English:
output: They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En función del tipo de mutación, de la significancia del trozo de material genético afectado y de si involucra células germinales, la mutación puede tener diversos efectos.
English:
output: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Únicamente las mutaciones en células germinales se pueden transmitir a los niños, mientras que las que ocurren en otras partes pueden causar la muerte celular o cáncer.
English:
output: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El turismo basado en la naturaleza suele atraer a gente interesada en visitar áreas naturales para disfrutar del paisaje, lo que incluye la vida silvestre animal y vegetal.
English:
output: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Algunos ejemplos de posibles actividades en el lugar son: caza, pesca, fotografía, avistamiento de aves y visita a parques, y estudio de información del ecosistema.
English:
output: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Un ejemplo es visitar, tomar fotografías y aprender sobre los orangutanes en Borneo.
English:
output: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Cada mañana, las personas abandonan pequeños pueblos en sus automóviles para ir hacia sus trabajos y suelen cruzarse con otras cuyos empleos se encuentran en el lugar del que acaban de salir.
English:
output: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En esta lanzadera de traslado dinámico, todos están de algún modo conectados con un sistema de transporte basado en el uso de automóviles privados, y lo sostienen.
English:
output: In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Actualmente, los científicos sostienen que esta economía masiva del carbono ha privado a la biosfera de uno de sus estados regulares que ha contribuido con la evolución de la humanidad por los últimos dos millones de años.
English:
output: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Todos forman parte de la sociedad y hacen uso de los sistemas de transporte; y casi todos se quejan de ellos.
English:
output: Everyone participates in society and uses transportation systems. Almost everyone complains about transportation systems.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En países desarrollados, es poco frecuente escuchar niveles parecidos de reclamos sobre la calidad del agua o el derrumbe de puentes.
English:
output: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: ¿Cuál es la razón de que los sistemas de transporte den lugar a quejas de tal calibre y por qué se producen fallas diariamente? ¿Son los ingenieros de transporte sencillamente incapaces? ¿O hay algo más sustancial que está sucediendo?
English:
output: Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El flujo de tráfico es el estudio del movimiento individual de conductores y vehículos entre dos puntos y de las interacciones entre ellos.
English:
output: Traffic Flow is the study of the movement of individual drivers and vehicles between two points and the interactions they make with one another.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Lamentablemente, no es tarea sencilla estudiar el flujo del tráfico, ya que es no es posible hacer predicciones exactas sobre el comportamiento de los conductores.
English:
output: Unfortunately, studying traffic flow is difficult because driver behavior cannot be predicted with one-hundred percent certainty.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Por fortuna, existe una tendencia en los conductores a mantener un comportamiento relativamente consistente, lo que permite que los flujos de tráfico tengan una consistencia lógica y puedan ser objeto de representación matemática aproximada.
English:
output: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Con el fin de graficar más claramente el flujo de circulación, se establecieron relaciones entre los tres elementos más importantes: (1) flujo, (2) densidad y (3) velocidad.
English:
output: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Dichas relaciones facilitan tanto el planeamiento y el diseño como las operaciones de los dispositivos viales.
English:
output: These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Las primeras especies en levantar vuelo fueron los insectos. Esto los ayudó a evadir a sus enemigos más fácilmente y a encontrar alimento y pareja de forma más efectiva.
English:
output: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La mayoría de los insectos tiene la ventaja de poder doblar las alas hacia atrás, pegándolas a los lados del cuerpo.
English:
output: Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Esto les proporciona un abanico más grande de posibles lugares pequeños para ocultarse de los depredadores.
English:
output: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Actualmente, los anisópteros y los efemerópteros son los únicos insectos incapaces de doblar sus alas.
English:
output: Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Milenios atrás, un hombre llamado Aristarco comentó que el Sistema Solar giraba en torno al Sol.
English:
output: Thousands of years ago, a man called Aristarchus said that the Solar System moved around the Sun.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Había quienes compartían su teoría, pero muchos otros creían lo opuesto: que el sistema solar orbitaba a la Tierra, incluso el Sol y otras estrellas.

output: Some people thought he was right but many people believed the opposite; that the Solar System moved around the Earth, including the Sun (and even the other stars).

instruction:

Spanish: Esto parece tener sentido, ya que en la Tierra no se percibe su movimiento, ¿cierto?
English:
output: This seems sensible, because the Earth doesn't feel as if it's moving, does it?

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El río Amazonas es el más caudaloso y el segundo más extenso del planeta. Contiene 8 veces más agua que el río que le sigue en tamaño.

output: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Además, el Amazonas es el río más ancho del planeta, en algunos puntos con una amplitud de hasta seis millas.
English:
output: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Del total del agua proveniente de los ríos del mundo que desemboca en los océanos, el 20 por ciento deriva del Amazonas.
English:
output: A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El gran Río Amazonas tiene una extensión de 6387 km (3980 millas) y recibe agua de miles de ríos de menor tamaño.
English:
output: The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Si bien las pirámides de piedra continuaron construyéndose hasta el final del Reino Antiguo, nunca pudo superarse a las de Guiza, ni en tamaño ni en lo sublime de la técnica de su edificación.
English:
output: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El antiguo pueblo egipcio del Imperio Nuevo quedó maravillado con los monumentos de sus antepasados, que en ese entonces databan de más de un milenio.
English:
output: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Con aproximadamente 800 habitantes, la Ciudad del Vaticano es el país independiente más pequeño del mundo y el de menor población.
English:
output: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El italiano se usa en Ciudad del Vaticano, tanto para redactar su normativa como para emitir sus comunicados oficiales.
English:
output: Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La lengua que hablan a diario la mayoría de quienes trabajan dentro del estado es también el italiano y el uso del latín queda generalmente reservado para las ceremonias religiosas.
English:
output: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La totalidad de los ciudadanos que viven en Ciudad del Vaticano adscriben a la religión católica romana.
English:
output: All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los elementos químicos básicos como el oro, la plata y el cobre son conocidos desde la antigüedad, puesto que todos ellos pueden encontrarse en la naturaleza en su forma original y son relativamente fáciles de extraer con herramientas rudimentarias.
English:
output: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El filósofo Aristóteles desarrolló la teoría de que todo está formado por una combinación de uno o varios de cuatro elementos: tierra, agua, aire y fuego.
English:
output: Aristotle, a philosopher, theorised that everything is made up of a mixture of one or more of four elements. They were earth, water, air, and fire.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Ello guardaba mayor similitud con los estados de la materia (con idéntico orden): sólido, líquido, gaseoso y plasma, solo que, al mismo tiempo, tenía la teoría de que se transforman en nuevas sustancias que conforman las cosas que vemos.
English:
output: This was more like the four states of matter (in the same order): solid, liquid, gas, and plasma, though he also theorised that they change into new substances to form what we see.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Las aleaciones son, básicamente, una combinación de dos o más metales. Recuerde que la tabla periódica tiene muchos elementos.
English:
output: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Se consideran metales a los elementos como el calcio y el potasio. Desde ya, también existen metales del tipo del oro y la plata.
English:
output: Elements like calcium and potassium are considered metals. Of course, there are also metals like silver and gold.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: También es posible que existan aleaciones con presencia de pequeñas cantidades de elementos, como el carbono, que no son metálicos.
English:
output: You can also have alloys that include small amounts of non-metallic elements like carbon.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Todo en el Universo está hecho de materia, compuesta por partículas pequeñas denominadas átomos.
English:
output: Everything in the Universe is made of matter. All matter is made of tiny particles called atoms.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El tamaño de los átomos es tan impresionantemente diminuto que el punto final de esta oración podría contener billones de ellos.
English:
output: Atoms are so incredibly tiny that trillions of them could fit into the period at the end of this sentence.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Por ello, cuando se inventó, el lápiz ganó muchos amigos.
English:
output: Thus, the pencil was a good friend to many people when it came out.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Desafortunadamente, a raíz de la implementación de nuevos métodos de escritura, el lápiz se utiliza menos y ha perdido su estatus.
English:
output: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Hoy en día, las personas escriben mensajes en las pantallas de sus computadoras. No tienen la necesidad de, siquiera, aproximarse a un sacapuntas.
English:
output: People now write messages on computer screens, never having to come close to a sharpener.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Solo queda preguntarse qué será del teclado cuando surja algo más nuevo.
English:
output: One can only wonder what the keyboard will become when something newer comes along.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La bomba atómica opera en base al principio de que se requiere energía para conformar un núcleo con gran cantidad de protones y neutrones.
English:
output: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Es similar a lo que sucede al rodar un carro pesado en ascenso por una colina. Al dividir el núcleo una vez más, libera parte de esa energía.
English:
output: Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los núcleos de algunos átomos son inestables, es decir que tienden a descomponerse con un mínimo o casi ningún empujón.
English:
output: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La superficie de la luna se compone de rocas y polvo y su capa exterior se denomina corteza.
English:
output: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La corteza tiene un espesor de unos 70 km en el lado cercano y de 100 km en el lejano.
English:
output: The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Es más delgada bajo los mares lunares y más gruesa bajo las tierras altas.
English:
output: It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Es posible que haya más mares en el lado cercano debido a que su corteza es más delgada, lo que facilitó a la lava ascender a la superficie.
English:
output: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Las teorías de contenido se centran en buscar qué es lo que atrae o gusta a la gente.
English:
output: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Estas doctrinas sostienen que las personas tienen ciertas necesidades o deseos que han sido internalizados a medida que crecieron hasta alcanzar la madurez.
English:
output: These theories suggest that people have certain needs and/or desires which have been internalized as they mature to adulthood.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Estas teorías analizan qué es lo que provoca que ciertas personas quieran las cosas que hacen y qué factores de su entorno los obligan a hacer o no determinadas cosas.
English:
output: These theories look at what it is about certain people that make them want the things that they do and what things in their environment will make them do or not do certain things.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Dos teorías de muy conocidas son la de la jerarquía de necesidades, de Maslow, y la de los dos factores, de Hertzberg.
English:
output: Two popular content theories are Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory and Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En general, pueden darse dos tipos de comportamiento cuando los gerentes comienzan a liderar a sus antiguos compañeros. De un lado del espectro, está el intento de continuar siendo «uno de los muchachos» (o muchachas).
English:
output: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: A los gerentes de esta categoría le cuesta tomar decisiones de las que caen mal a los empleados, imponer medidas disciplinarias, realizar evaluaciones de desempeño, asignar responsabilidades y exigir rendición de cuentas al personal.
English:
output: This type of manager has difficulty making unpopular decisions, performing disciplinary action, performance evaluations, assigning responsibility, and holding people accountable.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: En el otro extremo del espectro, se muta en una persona irreconocible que cree necesario modificar todo lo que hasta ahora ha venido haciendo el grupo y hacerlo a su manera.
English:
output: At the other end of the spectrum, one morphs into an unrecognizable individual that feels he or she must change everything the team has been doing and make it their own.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: A fin de cuentas, el responsable último del éxito y del fracaso del equipo es el líder.
English:
output: After all, the leader is ultimately responsible for the success and failure of the team.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Esta forma de comportarse muchas veces termina distanciando a los líderes de los demás integrantes del equipo.
English:
output: This behavior oftentimes results in rifts between the leaders and the rest of the team.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los mismos estándares de excelencia que manejan los equipos convencionales aplican para los virtuales, aunque existen pequeñas diferencias.
English:
output: Virtual teams are held to the same standards of excellence as conventional teams, but there are subtle differences.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Con frecuencia, los integrantes de un equipo virtual operan como punto de contacto para su grupo físico más cercano.
English:
output: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Por lo general, gozan de mayor autonomía que los integrantes de un grupo tradicional, gracias a que es posible para sus equipos reunirse de acuerdo con diferentes zonas horarias que, por ejemplo, podrían no ser comprendidas por la gerencia local.
English:
output: They often have more autonomy than conventional team members as their teams may meet according to varying time zones which may not be understood by their local management.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: La existencia de un real «equipo invisible» (Larson y LaFasto, 1989 p. 109) constituye también un elemento exclusivo de los equipos virtuales.
English:
output: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: El «equipo invisible» es el grupo a cargo de la gestión y al que cada miembro se reporta. Es el que fija los estándares para cada integrante.
English:
output: The “invisible team” is the management team to which each of the members report. The invisible team sets the standards for each member.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: ¿Qué motivo podría tener una organización para someterse al demandante proceso de establecer una organización de aprendizaje? Uno de los propósitos de aplicar los conceptos teóricos del aprendizaje organizacional es impulsar la innovación.
English:
output: Why would an organization want to go through the time consuming process of establishing a learning organization? One goal for putting organizational learning concepts into practice is innovation.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Cuando la totalidad de los recursos disponibles se utilizan de manera adecuada en los departamentos operativos de una organización, se genera espacio para la creatividad y el ingenio.
English:
output: When all available resources are effectively used across the functional departments of an organization, creativity and ingenuity can transpire.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Producto de ello, es posible que el proceso de una organización que trabaja en equipo para superar una dificultad de lugar a un nuevo proceso innovador a fin de atender las necesidades de los clientes.
English:
output: As a result, the process of an organization working together to overcome an obstacle can lead to a new innovative process to serve the customer's need.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Para que una organización sea innovadora, el liderazgo debe primero generar una cultura de innovación, al igual que un conocimiento compartido y un aprendizaje organizacional.
English:
output: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.

instruction:

English:
output: Angel (2006), explains the Continuum approach as a method being used to help organizations reach a higher level of performance.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los datos neurobiológicos ofrecen evidencia fáctica para un enfoque teórico de la investigación de la cognición. Reducen, por tanto, el campo de investigación y le confieren mayor exactitud.
English:
output: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:

English:
output: The correlation between brain pathology and behaviour supports scientists in their research.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Desde hace mucho se sabe que varios tipos de daño cerebral, traumas, lesiones y tumores afectan la conducta y causan cambios en las funciones mentales.
English:
output: It has been known for a long time that different types of brain damage, traumas, lesions, and tumours affect behaviour and cause changes in some mental functions.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Gracias al apogeo de las nuevas tecnologías, tenemos la posibilidad de ver e investigar estructuras y procesos que se producen en el cerebro que jamás antes se han visto.
English:
output: The rise of new technologies allows us to see and investigate brain structures and processes never seen before.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:

English:
output: This provides us with a lot of information and material to build simulation models which help us to understand processes in our mind.

instruction:

English:
output: Although AI has a strong connotation of science fiction, AI forms a very important branch of computer science, dealing with behavior, learning and intelligent adaptation in a machine.

English:
output: Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior.

instruction:

output: The AI ​​system is now often used in the fields of economics, medicine, engineering and the military, as has been built in several home computer and video game software applications.

instruction:

output: Field trips are a large part of any classroom. Quite often a teacher would love to take her students places to which a bus trip is not an option.

instruction:

English:
output: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Compartir una excursión en forma virtual también es una excelente forma de reflexionar sobre una salida y compartir experiencias con clases futuras.
English:
output: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Por ejemplo, todos los años, los alumnos de la escuela Bennet en Carolina del Norte diseñan una página web acerca de su viaje a la capital del Estado y cada año la página se actualiza, pero se conservan en línea las versiones previas que en la forma de álbum de recuerdos.
English:
output: For example, each year students from Bennet School in North Carolina design a website about their trip to the State Capital, each year the website gets remodeled, but old versions are kept online to serve as a scrapbook.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los blogs también pueden contribuir a mejorar la redacción de los alumnos. Aun cuando los estudiantes suelen iniciar su experiencia de blog con una gramática y ortografía poco cuidadas, esto generalmente cambia ante la presencia de una audiencia.
English:
output: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Debido a que los estudiantes suelen ser los lectores que más critican, el escritor de blogs empieza a esforzarse por mejorar su redacción, a fin de evitar las críticas.

output: Since students are often the most critical audience, the blog writer begins to strive to improve writing to avoid criticism.

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Asimismo, el blogueo «exige que los alumnos sean más comprensivos del mundo que los circunda». La necesidad de avivar el interés de la audiencia los inspira a ser inteligentes e interesantes (Toto, 2004).
English:
output: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).

instruction:
Translate the following Spanish source text to English:
Spanish: Los blogs son un recurso que inspira a la colaboración y animan a los alumnos a profundizar su aprendizaje más allá del típico día escolar.
